level.heading: Receipt for custodial property.
level.text: A written acknowledgement of delivery by a custodian constitutes a sufficient receipt and discharge for custodial property transferred under this act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-87
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-87, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-301.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This act", referred to at the end of the section, is the District of Columbia Uniform Transfers to Minors Act, D.C. Law 6-87 which is codified primarily as § 21-301 et seq.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 8 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act.
